title: Kurnool to Ujjain Mahakaleshwar Tour
overview: Experience the divine energy of Mahakaleshwar Jyotirlinga with our specially curated tour from Kurnool. This journey takes you through the spiritual heart of Ujjain, offering a seamless blend of devotion and comfort.

itinerary.title: Arrival & Temple Visit
itinerary.desc: Arrival at Ujjain, hotel check-in. In the evening, witness the mesmerizing Bhasma Aarti or evening aarti at the Mahakaleshwar temple.

itinerary.title: Ujjain Sightseeing
itinerary.desc: Full day sightseeing including Kal Bhairav Temple, Harsiddhi Mata Temple, and a peaceful evening at Ram Ghat.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.desc: Enjoy a hearty breakfast, complete checkout formalities, and proceed for your return journey with divine memories.
